It all kicked off with a conference in Santiago, Chile

Attended by 102 people

From 25 countries

And more than 50 organisations

…All getting very excited about sharing civic tech.

Now we keep in touch with a very active mailing list

There are 295 of us on there… and more join every week.

In fact, you’d be welcome too.

Via Poplus, we’re sharing and refining code as Poplus Components

10+ Countries using Poplus
Components right now

Poplus supported projects with small grants

In Morocco, Argentina (2 projects), Italy, Mexico, Australia, and Malaysia.

With a total of $30,027 we supported the refinement or building of 7 Poplus Components for everyone to use.
